trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Asgeir is confused by what he found in the woods.
TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pristine crate to Asgeir.

TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_000<tab>I was out gathering lumber the other day when out of nowhere an arrow came whistling past my head. It wasn't until I regained my composure that I realized a letter had been tied to it.
TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_001<tab>Or rather, a map, which had a location not far from here marked on it.

TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_002<tab>It's likely a trap, but I suspect whatever danger may be lying in waiting will prove little trouble for a guest of Master Matoya. If you should find anything there, be it treasure or something else, I would gladly share it with you.
TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_010<tab>I know not where the map came from, but I'm curious to see what you find.
TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_020<tab>Ah, you are returned. Did you find anything?
TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_021<tab>A crate...? It's filled with staves and bows. <gasp> It couldn't be...

TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_022<tab>A number of weapons were stolen from our storehouse but a few days past. We tracked them as far as we could, but their trail went cold at the border to Yx'Maja.
TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_023<tab>Do you suppose the keepers of Yx'Maja placed the crate there?

TEXT_LUCKZE020_03454_ASGEIR_000_024<tab>At any rate, we are grateful to have our weapons returned to us, though I can't imagine you would have need of them. But you must be compensated for your troubles. Here─this is for you.
